5808dbff8c6123ee5.name: Alligator Weed
5808dbff8c6123ee5.description: Colorful red stems, leaves turn to copper in the sun, and also known as "Copper Leaf".

9c7385082c3c01210.name: Arrow Arum
9c7385082c3c01210.description: An attractive foliage plant with glossy dark green arrow-shaped foliage. Good clumping habit. Flowers are insignificant. N.American Native

5a23913daf1eb4be8.name: Arrowhead
5a23913daf1eb4be8.description: Has strong wide arrow shaped foliage and produces delicate white flowers with bright yellow centers. Reproduces by setting tubers in the fall for the following years plants.

511e741d6a82fdce9.name: Aztec Arrowhead
511e741d6a82fdce9.description: Strong, showy, rich green foliage is compimented by a profusion of white flowers; each with distinct burgundy markings and bright yellow centers. Awesome Specimen

aa59ce1ce50b6ce58.name: Bald Cypress
aa59ce1ce50b6ce58.description: Deciduous needle tree known to grow "knees" when planted below water level. Accepts severe pruning for limited area. Great for wet areas.

dd67c8612857adec9.name: Blue Bells
dd67c8612857adec9.description: Delightful blue trumpet-like flowers persist on this perennial throughout the summer.Severe pruning is suggested to transform this tall plant into a more compact bush-like stature

60ad669665a81ad7d.name: Dwarf Blue Bells
60ad669665a81ad7d.description: This TROPICAL is a dwarf version of the ever popular Blue Bells. Blooms so profusely that at times you can barely see the foliage

99162d58909561a6b.name: Blue Eyed Grass
99162d58909561a6b.description: A grass in the iris family which produces many small blue blooms during spring

2c52c98a2015da4fa.name: Blue Rush
2c52c98a2015da4fa.description: Pinpoint blue-gray needles form a dense and uniform clump. Semi-evergreen. Takes some shade.

f6b78f3d94e3c8c28.name: Bog Bean
f6b78f3d94e3c8c28.description: A native variety that's become almost extinct. Its pink buds unfold to delicate white fringed flowers complimented by soft green trifoliate leaves.

48dbe80f46f366732.name: Bog Lily
48dbe80f46f366732.description: The large bulbs of this TROPICAL variety produce narrow leaves and thick flower stalks that present exquisite pure white blossoms. Very fragrant.

72299624505b13d18.name: Pink Butterfly Flower
72299624505b13d18.description: Fragrant dense clusters of soft pink flowers that attract butterflies. Seed pods are unique and unusual.

22a20b59c89803ffb.name: White Butterfly Flower
22a20b59c89803ffb.description: A lovely hybrid. This fragrant beauty has pure white flowers that attract butterflies. Seed pods are unique and unusual

a027dd536a6a54466.name: Butterfly Ginger
a027dd536a6a54466.description: Delicate white flowers have an incredible, deliciously sweet fragrance. Tall graceful foliage and root are spice-sweet when broken.

b9350c0465472e744.name: Calla
b9350c0465472e744.description: It is a rhizomatous herbaceous perennial plant, evergreen where rainfall and temperatures are adequate, deciduous where there is a dry season. Its preferred habitat is in streams and ponds or on the banks. It grows to 0.6–1 m (2–3 ft) tall, with large clumps of broad, arrow shaped dark green leaves up to 45 cm (18 in) long. The Inflorescences are large, produced in spring, summer and autumn, with a pure white spathe up to 25 cm (10 in) and a yellow spadix up to 90 mm (3½ in) long.

a66210805bd681390.name: Bengal Tiger
a66210805bd681390.description: Brilliant splashes of yellow decorate the broad canna leaves for a constant summer display. Beautiful orange flowers

3e5c5a8f26729d321.name: Black Leaved Canna
3e5c5a8f26729d321.description: Lance-shaped glossy burgundy-black foliage. Red flowers.

3fb009d47ca27a88f.name: Blue Lobelia
3fb009d47ca27a88f.description: Lance shaped greeen leaves. Blue flowers held on tail spikes. Long blooming season. Performs best if the crown is above water level.

795056aa1d1640e74.name: Cardinal Flower
795056aa1d1640e74.description: Tall spikes of intense red flowers rise our of a modest display of foliage. Striking summer color for a long period

7fe35ea5e04be0458.name: Graceful Cattail
7fe35ea5e04be0458.description: Small narrow pokers atop slender pale-green leaves. A more compact growing habit than the larger cattail varieties.

b7e72f203ab36c8a3.name: Micro Cattail
b7e72f203ab36c8a3.description: This unique Micro-Miniature cattail is one of the most popular pond plants of all. It produces masses of 1 inch tall cattails atop very narrow blue-green foliage.

c920a242e255da9aa.name: Common Cattail
c920a242e255da9aa.description: Large Pokers perched above broad light green leaves make this cattail a favorite. Best results when planted in a large container

553cfdd1d33a99e94.name: Variegated Cattail
553cfdd1d33a99e94.description:
Shallow Water Plant
Striking green and cream variegated foliage persists all summer long. Tolerates some shade.
Great specimen plant

c395f86035eadda16.name: Water Celery
c395f86035eadda16.description: This HARDY plany will grow equally as well potted or floating. Semi-evergreen means it starts growing early making it an exceptional plant for natural and biological filtration.

4d9cdd4807811edfe.name: Variegated Water Celery
4d9cdd4807811edfe.description: Features unusally pink, green, and white foliage. Pink is outstanding in spring and fall. semi-evergreen.

7307796af23c1ece4.name: Chameleon Plant
7307796af23c1ece4.description: Multicolored red, blue, green, and yellow heart shaped leaves. Small white flowers with bright yellow centers. Leaf color varies with the amount of sun plant receives.

bc6fc2484cac786fc.name: Corkscrew Rush
bc6fc2484cac786fc.description: Very unusual dark green corkscrew like stems. Creates a mound of unique texture. Semi-evergreen.

9861c477c10b62cfd.name: Variegated Corkscrew Rush
9861c477c10b62cfd.description: A very compact plant with curly leaves that have yellow and green variegation with pink stripes.

e07fdb4678d7d18d1.name: Cotton Grass
e07fdb4678d7d18d1.description: Short grassy green foliage with snowy cotton flowers that hold well into the summer. Unique and unusual

1b871fa6885451847.name: Forget Me Not
1b871fa6885451847.description: This creeping groundcover is ideal for softening the edge of the pond. Sky blue flowers continue for weeks if pinched. Prefers partial shade or cool running water.

8d2189560066bc371.name: Cut Leaf Water Clover
8d2189560066bc371.description: A unique and unusual variety of clover that has a bery fancy leaf. Extremely easy to maintain even for beginners.

c56fecf5719cedbfd.name: Variegated Four Leaf Water Clover
c56fecf5719cedbfd.description: Floating leaves with a distinct pattern of green, yellow, and red. A robust grower that's excellent for beginners. The four leaf clover lays ontop of the water.

c8a7fd9a19452d62f.name: Four Leaf Water Clover
c8a7fd9a19452d62f.description: The hardiest of all the clovers. Upright bright green foliage adds a complimentary texture to the pond.

18072af4b6f7ea3df.name: Frog Fruit
18072af4b6f7ea3df.description: Delicate pink and white flowers float above deep green serrated edged foliage. An outstanding plant for softening the edges of containers and ponds.

034a12a83ad0b8fa2.name: Variegated Manna Grass
034a12a83ad0b8fa2.description: Cream colored foliage emerges in spring with beautiful pink highlights(inset). Grass like cream and green foliage continues through the summer. Also known as Glyceria.

cccc8068a59ada172.name: Golden Sedge
cccc8068a59ada172.description: Bright tellow foliage persists almost year round. Dark flowers produce bright yellow contrasting pollen that creates a unique pattern in early spring.

0249c10b57e66b668.name: Dwarf Horsetail
0249c10b57e66b668.description: Dark green, stiff foliage is evergreen. Thrives in moist soil to shallow water and loves the shade. Excellent for nestling between rocks at the pond's edge.

1667362b7dea25e18.name: Horsetail
1667362b7dea25e18.description: Hollow jointed stems, very distinctive. Nice cylindrical habit when grown in a container. Evergreen Enjoys some shade. North American Native

0872f1f7d9dc99166.name: Black Gamecock
0872f1f7d9dc99166.description: Striking midnight purple blossoms perch high atop graceful, medium green foliage. Attractive foliage plant after flowering.

459c1eb0f36a97614.name: Versicolor Blue Iris
459c1eb0f36a97614.description:
Delicate ciolet flowers rise gracefully above sword-like foliage. Its small stature makes it good for patio pool gardens or any pond.
North American Native

442fbac7ade5ddc6b.name: Copper Fulva Iris
442fbac7ade5ddc6b.description: Best grown in fertile, slightly acidic, consistently moist to wet soils in full sun. Tolerates part shade, particularly in the southern part of its growing range. Does well in wet clayey soils. May be grown in up to 6" of standing water. Grow in containers in water gardens.

b84e87565f50e524e.name: White Cowee Iris
b84e87565f50e524e.description: Hard to find iris that produces beautiful white with purple centers.

e06ac10cc3f7573b8.name: Lavender Musk
e06ac10cc3f7573b8.description: Delicate lavender flowers nestled among soft green foliage. Can be grown in shallow water or moist soil. Compact growth. Long bloomer.

58fee4642c3e60448.name: Lizards Tail
58fee4642c3e60448.description: North American native. This native HARDY variety gets its name from the unique seed formation that follows the delicate cream colored blossoms. Triangular medium green foliage.

3db61b7e0240cef08.name: Chinese Lizards Tail
3db61b7e0240cef08.description: Glossy bright green foliage until just prior to flowering when large while patches appear in the leaf. Centers just beneath the white flowers.

3028b111f541a73bd.name: Longwood Canna Flame
3028b111f541a73bd.description: This true aquatic canna is a TROPICAL variety that provides summer long color with its bright flame colored flowers atop tail. Narrow foliage and long blooming season. The best of the best in cannas

0b5b513d5d5c4f61c.name: Longwood Canna (pink)
0b5b513d5d5c4f61c.description: This true aquatic canna is a TROPICAL variety that provides summer long color with its bright pink flowers atop tail. Narrow foliage and long blooming season. The best of the best in cannas

feb7b2fbfb81f49e0.name: Longwood Canna/Red Endevour
feb7b2fbfb81f49e0.description: This true aquatic canna is a TROPICAL variety that provides summer long color with its bright red flowers atop tail. Narrow foliage and long blooming season. The best of the best in cannas

2a654109182e5f663.name: Longwood Canna Yellow
2a654109182e5f663.description: This true aquatic canna is a TROPICAL variety that provides summer long color with its bright yellow flowers atop tail. Narrow foliage and long blooming season. The best of the best in cannas

bddb1ffc57fd58361.name: Marsh Betany
bddb1ffc57fd58361.description: Tall spikes of intense pink flowers rise out of the modest display of foliage. Striking summer color for a long period.

bb660c8aac830f356.name: Marsh Marigold
bb660c8aac830f356.description: Intense golden-yellow flowers brighten the pond in early spring. Prefers cool running water or partial shade.

9f7b20231b22ba8b0.name: Water Mint
9f7b20231b22ba8b0.description: Wonderfully aromatic foliage and lilac-pink blossoms make this variety a favorite. Combines well with Water Hyacinth and Yellow Water Iris for natural and biological filtration

47a7c79e30e2dbea2.name: Curly Mint
47a7c79e30e2dbea2.description: This plant makes an excellent transition plant with its ruffled, textured leaves and delicate pink flower tufts.

e7577901e26beaea9.name: Yellow Monkey Flower
e7577901e26beaea9.description: The yellow Monkey Flower may grow from six inches to three feet in height.  It grows throughout North America but it isn't as cold tolerant as other species.  It has yellow flowers that are about 1 1/2" in size.  It grows in part to full shade in moist soil or water.

2c9af66c46a9a7285.name: Green Moneywort
2c9af66c46a9a7285.description: Excellent plant for aquarists who are new to keeping live plants. The leaves are elliptic and grow alternately along the stem. They are bright green, almost lime colored when hit by the light, and make an attractive addition to any aquarium. They are amphibious and will grow either partially or fully submersed.

8b0a8a129c2be3e99.name: Creeping Jenny
8b0a8a129c2be3e99.description: Vigorous grower that quickly creates an attractive carpet of foliage. Will grow directly into the water. Yellow flowers in summer.

353cd75d07ef28ae3.name: Blue Moneywort
353cd75d07ef28ae3.description: Foliage looks much like the bacopas. Intense, small, tubular purple blooms.

55e9ec3f6f55fccd7.name: Egyptian Compact Giant Papyrus
55e9ec3f6f55fccd7.description: An upright dwarf version of Cyperus giganteus. Very compact. Uniform growing habit. Likes part shade and moving water.

e3ac323b52116d8f8.name: Water Parsley
e3ac323b52116d8f8.description: Native perennial. Height: up to 40 inches. Habit: lax, often reclining. Leaves: blades up to 1 foot long borne on petioles up to 14 inches in length. The parsley-like leaf blade is divided into serrated, lobed leaflets. Flower: Compound umbel, 2-4 diameter, of many flowers with bright white to pink-tinged petals.

cf5fd5f864a9df1e9.name: Water Pennywort
cf5fd5f864a9df1e9.description: The small upstanding round foliage of this unique variety makes a great addition to any pond or water garden. Small clusters of creamy yellow flowers.

874f347e4634582fb.name: Giant Pennywort
874f347e4634582fb.description: A sturdier variety of Pennywort, this one stays fresh and crisp throughout the growing season. The delicate creamy green flowers are quite noticeable

10013c7f86e3a5fcf.name: Variegated Pennywort
10013c7f86e3a5fcf.description: Serrated foliage is beautifully marked in cream and green. Suitable only for moist ro wet soil or in cracks and crevices between rocks.

30540ac708a42a34d.name: Water Petunia
30540ac708a42a34d.description: Fuzzy green leaves with distinctive purple flowers.

9fca10c28744c01d4.name: Pickerel Rush
9fca10c28744c01d4.description: A native variety with all the best features. Easy to grow. Slick, broad dark green foliage. Bright lavender-blue flowers. Very long blooming period.

030d291a470919b46.name: White Pickerel Rush
030d291a470919b46.description: Attractive shiny green foliage combined with large white blossoms that have an incredibly long blooming period make this variety an outstanding choice for all ponds.

118084844df33ae27.name: Chi Chi
118084844df33ae27.description: This TROPICAL is a soft pink flowering version of Blue Bells. Foliage is rich green on top with dark purple-green undersides and stems

7822673c5b0b7ccf6.name: Water Plantain
7822673c5b0b7ccf6.description: A tier of small white flowers sit atop attractive ovate foliage. Contrasts well against tall narrow foliage.

650df5f0fc99cfd3d.name: Water Poppy
650df5f0fc99cfd3d.description: Small round upright leaves that contrast beautifully with bright yellow poppy like flowers. The foliage adds a unique texture to the ponds surface.

cfb5848df161b1320.name: Primrose Creeper
cfb5848df161b1320.description: Creeping foliage featuring bright yellow flowers that persist for most of the summer. Vigorous. Excellent for natural and biological filtration.

421baee6811ef73b1.name: Marble Queen
421baee6811ef73b1.description: Eye catching and has an outstanding creamy flow and green variegated foliage. Clusters of white flowers appear on arched stems. Viviparous.

415d94a85aa3258ea.name: Pink Rain Lily
415d94a85aa3258ea.description: The soft rosy-pink petals open wide on 8 to 12 inch stems. Rich green chive like foliage creates a dense grassy appearance.

1d0083933a9ab3c81.name: Strawberries and Cream Ribbon Grass
1d0083933a9ab3c81.description: Produces colorful variegated foliage all season long. Strong pink color spring and fall.

88dfa7556e463039c.name: Dwarf Sagittaria
88dfa7556e463039c.description: Dwarf 6 inch ribbon like leaves grow in a dense matt. Provides an excellent spawning area for fish. Can grow below or above water line.

675213822cf0e9eb5.name: Sensitive Plant
675213822cf0e9eb5.description: This unique fern like plant floats on the waters surf suspended by a velvety tube surrounding the stem. When touched, the delicate leaves close immediately. Brilliant yellow flowers stand just above the foliage.

2a8122368f0b84659.name: Giant Sensitive Fern
2a8122368f0b84659.description: Floats and spreads across the water's surface. Yellow sweetpea-like flowers. Foliage closes slowly when touched.

1f20c82c25cb18de6.name: Siberian Pink Cups
1f20c82c25cb18de6.description: Delicate pink flowers adom airy foliage. Similar in habit, but much smaller than Ranunculus flammula. Prefers a cool climate or part shade when summers are warm.

45313015061608952.name: Snowball Bush
45313015061608952.description: Trailing plants that produces white ball like flowers. A must for butterfly lovers!

40e6dd9c5069dc598.name: Variegated Society Garlic
40e6dd9c5069dc598.description: Flowers are lilac in color and stand well above the foliage

08544e7b22d9699c9.name: Miniature Spearwort
08544e7b22d9699c9.description: This shallow water variety produces masses of delicate bright yellow flowers all summer if spent flower stalks are removed promptly. The name flammula (flame) comes from the brilliant red stems produced in spring.

3cd29873d595cc5bf.name: Variegated Miniature Spearwort
3cd29873d595cc5bf.description: Lovely serrated golden green variegated leaves edged with chartreuse. Yellow flowers in early spring.

f2f95f1465d0ed61e.name: Star Grass
f2f95f1465d0ed61e.description: Narrow leaves atop needle-like stems unfold to reveal white star-shaped flowers that persist throughout the entire summer. Highly recommended.

4e2f0f774dbcd93e6.name: Variegated Striped Rush
4e2f0f774dbcd93e6.description: Stiff green sword-like foliage with vertical bright yellow stripes. Semi-evergreen. Easy for beginners.

1852539ca88dc79b3.name: Swamp Candles
1852539ca88dc79b3.description: Has a white flower, with a long yellow stamen, resembling a candle! Blooms profusely

2fa3b019c979377cb.name: Swamp Hibiscus
2fa3b019c979377cb.description: A native plant with pink, white, or red flowers. Hibiscus also adds a nice foliage alternative to any pond.

0f65fe0a006e6ea09.name: Dwarf Variegated Sweet Flag
0f65fe0a006e6ea09.description: Beautiful green and gold striped foliage forms dense clumps. Excellent for foreground planting.

e7d6da0d3efbfa4df.name: Sweet Flag
e7d6da0d3efbfa4df.description: Shiny green sword-like foliage is gently rippled and sweet scented when broken.

a1d44a8ffd6c52957.name: Variegated Sweet Flag
a1d44a8ffd6c52957.description: Beautiful green and cream striped foliage persists all summer. Leaves are sweetly scented when broken.

601ce18b97fde1a16.name: Black Magic
601ce18b97fde1a16.description: Features unique dusty charcoal-black foliage on dark burgandy-black stems. Awesome speciemen.

de22a543b09354344.name: Green Taro
de22a543b09354344.description: This unique tropical plant produces masses of large dark green leaves. Matures to 2-3 feet or taller if wintered indoors each year.

a803c8545548b8e68.name: Imperial Taro
a803c8545548b8e68.description: A superb tropical variety featuring large green leaves marked with violet-black splotches. The leaves appear textured.

8a5e12231f71058cf.name: Violet Stemmed Taro
8a5e12231f71058cf.description: Features attractive dark violet stems that contrast beautifully with huge green leaves. Great specimen plant.

5eace85dbc5bc74c9.name: Thalia
5eace85dbc5bc74c9.description: Has the bold dramatic look of a tropical, Not to mention the heavy rich purple flowers and seeds atop 6 to 7 inches narrow spikes that sway gracefully in the breeze.

c8cd85c27141a1152.name: Umbrella Grass
c8cd85c27141a1152.description: The hardy version of umbrella palm. This grassy foliage plant with umbrella like seed heads can make a great specimen in a large container.

c36f0165d0a178846.name: Dwarf Umbrella Palm
c36f0165d0a178846.description: Smaller narrow leaved version of umbrella palm. More erect habit. Easy to grow.

df97fc93faeef5a1c.name: Umbrella Palm
df97fc93faeef5a1c.description: An all-time favorite foliage plant that features umbrella-like leaves above stiff stems. Extremely easy to grow indoors in winter. Tolerates lower light levels.

56502499fcbae47de.name: Water Willow
56502499fcbae47de.description: White flowers are decorated with purple and resemble orchid flowers. The open foliage is similar to the narrow leaves of the willow.

83a7f09c1d83204b1.name: White Bulrush
83a7f09c1d83204b1.description: Striking white needle-like foliage is gently marked with narrow green stripes.

cfe2beff592757270.name: Zebra Rush
cfe2beff592757270.description: Bold green and white banded foliage make this plant truly unique.

c7723a2b8def3e7e5.name: Zephyr Lily
c7723a2b8def3e7e5.description: A small, profuse, ornamental bulb that produces white blooms above the green needle-like leaves. This South American native makes an excellent low lying transition plant

d25d958f8bd7cca40.name: Water Zinnia
d25d958f8bd7cca40.description: Zinnias are one of the easiest annuals to grow, grow quickly, and bloom heavily. They make a massive burst of color in your garden. Zinnias have bright, solitary, daisy-like flowerheads on a single, erect stem.

69d0d7969aa1544dd.name: Water Hyacinth
69d0d7969aa1544dd.description: Nearly transparent, intense lavender-blue flowers brushed lightly with purple and spotted yellow stand well above deep. Waxy-green foliage

7fd2c5795d6701c49.name: Dwarf or Regular Hyacinth
7fd2c5795d6701c49.description: Intense lavender flowers with dark purple and spotted yellow. Stands above waxy green foliage.

0c2be377a7374bf0f.name: Curly Lettuce
0c2be377a7374bf0f.description: Adorable floating plant, has a compact growing habbit, loves moving water.

bc70d8a357ac8d466.name: Rosette Water Lettuce
bc70d8a357ac8d466.description: has a compact growing habit and is more intricately patterned than common water lettuce. Loves moving water

9b5d4291433a17cf1.name: Duckweed (per portion)
9b5d4291433a17cf1.description: Duckweed is a very small light green free-floating, seed bearing plant. Duckweed has 1 to 3 leaves, or fronds, of 1/16 to 1/8 inch in length. A single root (or root-hair) protrudes from each frond. Duckweeds tend to grow in dense colonies in quiet water, undisturbed by wave action.

e41dec6271ea600ea.name: Fairy Moss
e41dec6271ea600ea.description: Attractive green and red floating fern. Tiny leaves. Koi love to eat this plant which can be grown in a seperate tub fed to fish.

9a32a37e8f50358fc.name: Frog Bit
9a32a37e8f50358fc.description: Miniature floating plant with leaves 1 to 2 inches across. Attractive shiny foliage. Flowers inconspicuous. Reproduces readily from seed

068f23aa3ea4d8df3.name: Water Velvet
068f23aa3ea4d8df3.description: Also called water fern, this tiny, floating bright green fern has two conjoined oval leaves covered with many bristly hairs. Its rootlike structures are actually modified fronds. For best results, keep this floating plant in calm water. Sun: Full sun to partial shade

1076a5bdd5c8b4daf.name: Golden Groove Bamboo
1076a5bdd5c8b4daf.description: Evergreen and one of the most cold hardiest bamboo that have beautiful light green canes with golden yellow stripe or groove. It makes an excellent tall, dense privacy screen with a few canes that have a zig-zag at base. A very upright species at maturity. Less aggressive in cooler climates.

90df682323b008831.name: Colorado
90df682323b008831.description: Medium sized, fragrant blossoms open an unusual peach-yellow color and gradually change to orange with yellow stamens. Excellent bloomer.

d46ecbd855096dfc8.name: Arc-en-Ciel
d46ecbd855096dfc8.description: True Variegated foliage with splashes of red, pink, yellow, white, and green. Soft, feminine pink flowers.

29759d588795cc6fc.name: Marliac Carnea
29759d588795cc6fc.description: Masses of delicate blush pink flowers contrast beautifully with rich green foliage. Good for any size pond. Unsurpassed reliablity.

37b865372c1c30907.name: Pink Generic
37b865372c1c30907.description: With blossoms that are uniquely beautiful lilies are almost always the focal point of any pond. Blooms spring to fall. Flower shape and color may vary from photo

28170bc6285e8624d.name: Rose Arey
28170bc6285e8624d.description: Large vibrant star shaped pink flowers add an exciting dimension to any pond. Performs equally as well in small or large ponds. Blooms profusely.

83f5938231e687fca.name: Berit Strawn
83f5938231e687fca.description: Intensely purple speckled leaves are a nice compliment to the unique salmon blossoms. Best suited to small to medium ponds

9bb2309c9b9e39209.name: Mayla
9bb2309c9b9e39209.description: Extremely large double fuschia blossoms. A very profuse bloomer that's great for large ponds. Incredibly beautiful

88663eacf093a70f0.name: Almost Black
88663eacf093a70f0.description: The intriguing double flowers are the color of black cherry soda. Foliage is dark green; new leaves are red.

de5e894e297c075d9.name: Attraction
de5e894e297c075d9.description: Large, showy flowers with red petals that deepen in color to a wine red center with white sepals. Lush green foliage provides an attractive background.

09b91cbe2a953eff4.name: James Brydon
09b91cbe2a953eff4.description: Distinctly cup shaped rich red blossoms are the trade mark of this reliable variety. Will tolerate some shade. Blooms profusely.

25a4961846ef4cdfe.name: Red Generic
25a4961846ef4cdfe.description: With blossoms that are uniquely beautiful lilies are almost always the focal point of any pond. Blooms spring to fall. Flower shape and color may vary from photo.

9693c0a94b37ae3d2.name: Sirius
9693c0a94b37ae3d2.description: Star shaped purple-red flowers. New leaves contain maroon blotches. Very free flowering.

6283655676f77945d.name: White Generic
6283655676f77945d.description: With blossoms that are uniquely beautiful lilies are almost always the focal point of any pond. Blooms spring to fall. Flower shape may vary from photo.

e39e6cc61890230a5.name: Charlene Strawn
e39e6cc61890230a5.description: Free blooming lemon yellow flowers make this an all time favorite. Rich green leaves sprinkled with burgundy. Reliable and easy to care for. Blooms profusely

7d9f5ad8c95cf0515.name: Chromatella
7d9f5ad8c95cf0515.description: Brilliant primrose yellow blossoms surrounded by beautifally mottled foliage. Extremely versatile. Adapts equally as well to a pond or patio pool garden. Blooms profusely.

53dc638a44398c42a.name: Sulfurea
53dc638a44398c42a.description: Free blooming bright yellow blossoms contrast beautifally with rich, deep freen foliage. Overall great performer. Does very well in patio pool gardens and small to medium ponds.

7d82273eee8ae9af2.name: Texas Dawn
7d82273eee8ae9af2.description: Bright yellow blossoms are held regally above tichly mottled foliage. This gem actually looks more like a tropical than a hardy. Unbelievably profuse bloomer.

55d1e7fc8ebd73cb6.name: Yellow Generic
55d1e7fc8ebd73cb6.description: With blossoms that are uniquely beautiful lilies are almost always the focal point of any pond. Blooms spring to fall. Flower shape and color may vary from photo.

5901b4e0eb76b2de3.name: Comanche
5901b4e0eb76b2de3.description: Delicate pale yellow blossoms that slowly change to a rich copper. Excellent for medium to large ponds. Blooms profusley.

bf5fcddfca2ccb930.name: Helvola
bf5fcddfca2ccb930.description: A great miniature that throws up a continuous display of delicate yellow flowers. Opens late and stays open late. Excellent for patio pool gardens, and small containers.

eef49a3bb9a4c96d2.name: Perrys Baby Red
eef49a3bb9a4c96d2.description: Free blooming dwarf variety featuring beautiful wine red flowers. Excellent for small ponds and patio gardens.

0b9315d62cfecb449.name: Mexicana
0b9315d62cfecb449.description: Attractive marbled foliage with bright yellow blossums. Perfuse bloomer.

883f1257e4a38ed09.name: Madame Ganna Walska
883f1257e4a38ed09.description: Day bloomer. Truly is a breathtaking variety. Light pink to lavender blossoms tower above highly mottled dark green foliage. Blooms profusely.

4b40071f1287b4691.name: Panama Pacific
4b40071f1287b4691.description: One of the prettiest and most vibrant of all varieties. Also one of the hardiest. Deep purple flowers bloom profusely high above rivh dark foliage. Viviparous.

d1acb7733b6482b63.name: Indica
d1acb7733b6482b63.description: White snowflake shaped flowers are produced continually all summer above smooth round lily like leaves.

5db44f12b96a363e5.name: Texas Shell Pink
5db44f12b96a363e5.description: Night Bloomer. An all time favorite. Incredibly delicate soft shell pink flowers seem to glow in the moonlight. Deep, rich green foliage, Blooms profusely.

ed1ab2650082f096b.name: Red Flare
ed1ab2650082f096b.description: Red night bloomer with blossoms that are uniquely beautiful lilies are almost always the focal point of any pond. Flower shape and color may vary from photo.

4efeb5ecd706892bb.name: Variegated Mediterranean Reed
4efeb5ecd706892bb.description: This thick stemmed HARDY shallow water plant produces an abundance of creamy white variegated foliage. Inset shows a fall bloom

7cfe8b64313eb02c1.name: Spider Lily
7cfe8b64313eb02c1.description: Strap-like leaves with decorative and extremely fragrant pure white flowers. Bulb winters easily indoors as a house plant. Bright burgandy foliage!

af1003545ee3b4857.name: Spike Rush
af1003545ee3b4857.description: This attractive rush features quill shaped foliage and grows to about 12 inch high. A favorite for the very edge of the pond.

23a62c6f497c3d456.name: Cygnet Activator
23a62c6f497c3d456.description: Liquid additive is to be used along with liquid herbicides and algaecides to enhance their effectiveness. The surfactant in these non-ionic, water soluble and biodegradable products eliminates beading, providing a uniform spray solution.

492c9a4aa3b0134ea.name: Pond Care AlgaeFix
492c9a4aa3b0134ea.description: Effective to eliminate existing algae as green water, string or hair blanketweed in ponds that contain live plants.  Helps resolve additional algae blooms.  Keeps ponds and water gardens clean and clear.  Safe for plants and fish.

67419a0db60a22d00.name: Microbe-Lift Algaway 5.4
67419a0db60a22d00.description: No more green water.  Stop algae growth in ponds. Control string algae.  Will not harm fish or live plants

94fb1946ba156c262.name: Aquashade Pond Dye
94fb1946ba156c262.description: Aquashade is a concentrated liquid formulation for use in contained lakes and ponds. Contains a blend of blue and yellow dyes to block out specific light rays critical to photosynthesis.

52da115d8ba01e6d7.name: Aquatic Plant Nutrient Spray
52da115d8ba01e6d7.description: Plant nutrient spray provides all essential nutrients to nourish plants for strong and healthy growth.  Easy spray form.  Safe for use in ponds containing fish.

92deb8e44ef4987cf.name: Microbe-Lift Aqua Xtreme
92deb8e44ef4987cf.description: Convenient liquid, single-phase, full-function water conditioner that has been scientifically formulated for use in ponds.  Should be used when: conditioning new water for ponds; adding (or prior to adding) water, new fish or plants to ponds; and transporting fish.

f2cdf6d051ad560de.name: Barley Straw Pellets
f2cdf6d051ad560de.description: Enriched with peat and humic acid, this revolutionary formula works faster & better with Less Mess and is easier to apply than bales, pillows and pads!

36fdb54cd9c178ff7.name: Crystal Clear Biological Clarifier Dry PLUS
36fdb54cd9c178ff7.description: Helps create a clear, healthy system by eliminating sludge and other organic materials. Natural freeze-dried bacteria that contains activated barley to remove dead algae, leaves, fish waste and uneaten food to keep your pond odor-free and sparking. Safe for all fish and plants.

49724837a429a274f.name: Clearpac
49724837a429a274f.description: Includes everything you need to keep your pond clean and clear all season long. Save time, money and guesswork with this all-in-one pond care package.

9fe27736eadc4a839.name: Microbe-Lift Cold Weather Food
9fe27736eadc4a839.description: Scientifically formulated to provide the nutrients your pond fish will need during fall to early spring seasons fluctuating temperatures.  Increases fish heartiness while decreasing chance of disease.

d53de8ef410181e4c.name: Crystal Clear Algae Off
d53de8ef410181e4c.description: Works on contact for immediate algae control. Formulated to treat, control, and prevent a broad spectrum of algae - even stubborn string algae. Also helps break down unsightly organic buildup.

7d60be0fba4dac804.name: Crystal Clear Aphid X
7d60be0fba4dac804.description: Best results when applied prior to insect infestation keeps insects off aquatic plants for 7 days.  100% safe for fish and plants.  Odorless shortly after application.  Great for both aquatic and terrestrial plants.

cb2be34970c404872.name: Crystal Clear Clarity Max
cb2be34970c404872.description: Cleans ponds by breaking down organic materials that create problems for pond hobbyists in and around waterfalls, rocks, plant pots, pumps and filtration systems.  Contains Activated Barley which will greatly reduce algae growth.

7d698b5e8f60a6587.name: Crystal Clear Pond Tint
7d698b5e8f60a6587.description: Turns your pond to an alluring shade of blue to filter sunlight and prevent photosynthesis from occurring.

0471cc5acccda4515.name: Crystal Clear Thrive
0471cc5acccda4515.description: Aquatic plant fertilizer that maximizes your plants beauty and color vibrancy through out the season.  Easy and safe application.

dd8d3ed90f8f8e080.name: Cutrine Plus Granular
dd8d3ed90f8f8e080.description: Cutrine Plus Granular is fast acting granular algaecide, formulated for the control of algae and chara.

590bf44582d2a2307.name: Cutrine Plus Liquid
590bf44582d2a2307.description: Utilizes the latest in oxygen technology.  Long lasting control of a variety of algae species. For floating or suspended algea.

be88938102a7c4a58.name: Cygnet Select
be88938102a7c4a58.description: Cygnet Select is an organic water dye that will color the water a deep rich blue. The coloring will remain visible for up to four months under normal conditions.

c523ed5317f943271.name: Crystal Clear D-Solv9 Complete Pond Cleaner
c523ed5317f943271.description: Fastest and most efficient water clarifier on the market today.  Designed to clear water of all size ponds, fountains, bubblers, and streams.

68bdbe0b33232a702.name: Pond Care Ecofix
68bdbe0b33232a702.description: Natural product.  Cleaner and clearer water.  Breaks down dead algae.  Increases the concentration of dissolved oxygen in pond water.

c9a0ce794595dbfd0.name: Flavored Koi Treats
c9a0ce794595dbfd0.description: Contains Real Fruit, Feed Anytime, Source of Antioxidants, Vitamin Fortified, Vitamin C, and Low Nitrogen for Less Algae Floating

235d1292d69315df8.name: Green Clean
235d1292d69315df8.description: Powerful Oxidation Reaction Breaks Down Algae Cells On Contact

3a2a2b0f34f65245e.name: Microbe-Lift Growth And Energy Food
3a2a2b0f34f65245e.description: Increased protein will assist your fish growth after the cold season.  Will not cloud water.

85be23824581d0de8.name: Cygnet Hydrothol
85be23824581d0de8.description: Fast acting and effective on a variety of aquatic weeds.  Should only be used for spot treating. Use early in the season when plants are young and easier to treat.

24699b3decaf5f70d.name: Microbe-Lift Immune Stimulant Food
24699b3decaf5f70d.description: Ideal to provide additional minerals to help increase immunity against viruses commonly found in pond environments.  Optimal digestibility results in fewer uneaten particles and reduces fish waste leaves cleaner and clearer water.

d09ccac4606c8c071.name: Microbe-Lift Liquid Barley Extract
d09ccac4606c8c071.description: Decomposition process starts immediately.  Easier to use than pellets.  Concentrated.  Pour into pond and walk away.  Not harmful to humans, fish, plants, or pets.

3d0e70911a21ceaeb.name: Matala Biological Prefilter Bio11
3d0e70911a21ceaeb.description: Improves performance and longevity. Multiple pore sizes with progressive density that reduces clogging.  Less maintenance and better protection for you pump.  Inexpensive upgrade.  Can be placed anywhere in the pond.  Easily cleaned. Can be used with any biological filter.  Extended with multiple sections.  Maximum flow allowed 1980 GPH

a4660adb053c691cf.name: Matala Biological Prefilter Bio20
a4660adb053c691cf.description: Improves performance and longevity. Multiple pore sizes with progressive density that reduces clogging.  Less maintenance and better protection for you pump.  Inexpensive upgrade.  Can be placed anywhere in the pond.  Easily cleaned. Can be used with any biological filter.  Extended with multiple sections.  Maximum flow allowed 3405 GPH.

c835398596d28423f.name: Microbe-Lift Bacteria
c835398596d28423f.description: Creates a healthy pond environment, promoting faster fish growth.  100% natural, safe, and beneficial bacteria.  Dissolves away organic sludge and slime.  Improves dissolved oxygen levels.  Reduces ammonia, nitrogen levels, and noxious orders.  Safe for fish and plants.

f0ca250ad41fb8c0d.name: Microbe-Lift Pond Salt
f0ca250ad41fb8c0d.description: Help maintain a healthy fish environment.  Promotes stronger immune system and reduce stress.  Reducing the threat of parasitic infestation.

6caf689e9c69aa5eb.name: Microbe-Lift Sludge Away
6caf689e9c69aa5eb.description: Healthier and cleaner pond environment.  Accelerates the breakdown of difficult-to-remove sludge and muck buildup.  Indispensable for ponds with rock or gravel bottoms where vacuums may not be practical or effective.  Best when used with water temperatures above 55°F, although in heavily stocked pond, additional oxygen should be supplied in water temperatures 85°F and above.

2f84ed344c155d7fb.name: Mini Twin Barley Straw Bales
2f84ed344c155d7fb.description: Clear your pond, fountain, and fish tank naturally clean and clear.  Acts as a natural filter.  1 bale treats 1000 gallons.  Safe for fish and plants.

dfe37a61097bbfd66.name: Microbe-Lift Oxy Pond Cleaner
dfe37a61097bbfd66.description: Safely spot-treat all areas of light-to-heavy accumulations of debris on rocks, waterfalls, streams, planters, etc.  Oxygen power breaks down unsightly debris.  Oxidizes and detoxifies.  Helps prevent pond odors.  Use weekly to help remove stress from pond draining.  100% safe when used as directly..

7fb1b30d68bf75204.name: Pondair 2 by Pond Logic
7fb1b30d68bf75204.description: Increased stable environment resulting in healthier fish and plants.  During warmer months adds oxygen; during colder months aids in degassing pond.  Insures ponds receive needed oxygen even during night time hours when plant are not converting CO2 into oxygen.  Extremely energy-efficient.  Durable.  120V/60Hz; 4 watts; max airflow of .15 cfm.  For ponds up to 1000 gallons 2 stone.

2a544cd703e9f89cf.name: Pondair 4 by Pond Logic
2a544cd703e9f89cf.description: Increased stable environment resulting in healthier fish and plants.  During warmer months adds oxygen; during colder months aids in degassing pond.  Insures ponds receive needed oxygen even during night time hours when plant are not converting CO2 into oxygen.  Extremely energy-efficient.  Durable.  120V/60Hz; 8 watts; max airflow of .30 cfm.  For ponds up to 2000 gallons 4 stone.

6a0468ea06c96506b.name: Pondmaster 1000 (FILTER ONLY)
6a0468ea06c96506b.description: Keep maintenance and use simple with this submersible pond filter.  Fits all Pondmaster Pumps up to 700 GPH.  Connects to intake side of pump.  Pond use only.  1 Carbon Pad & 1 Course Polyester Pad.  1 year manufacturer warranty, excluding pads.  For ponds up to 1000 gallons.

05517f26b4e02e8b1.name: Pondmaster 1350
05517f26b4e02e8b1.description: Suitable for small to medium ponds, up to 800 gallons.  Includes 1000 filter unit, magnetic 350 GPH drive pump, one ¾ inch hose fitting, and two fountain heads which connect to the pump and to hose to connect units.  Fountain heads allow more aeration and an exciting water display.  Fish friendly, environmental sound, and energy efficient.  Water looks clean and pristine.

42b67e3852154e264.name: Pondmaster 1500
42b67e3852154e264.description: Suitable for small to medium ponds, up to 1000 gallons.  Includes 1000 filter unit, magnetic 500 GPH drive pump, one ¾ inch hose fitting, and two fountain heads which connect to the pump and to hose to connect units.  Fountain heads allow more aeration and an exciting water display.  Fish friendly, environmental sound, and energy efficient.  Water looks clean and pristine.

90eefb84e7465720d.name: Pondmaster 1700
90eefb84e7465720d.description: For ponds that require more filtering due to higher fish and/or plant population.  Ponds up to 1250 gallons.  Includes 1000 filter unit, magnetic 750 GPH drive pump, one ¾ inch hose fitting, and two fountain heads which connect to the pump and to hose to connect units.  Fountain heads allow more aeration and an exciting water display.  Fish friendly, environmental sound, and energy efficient.  Water looks clean and pristine

26569fdb0040ea5b6.name: Pondmaster 190
26569fdb0040ea5b6.description: Ponds from 50 to 275 gallons.   190 GPH.  Bell fountain.  Biological and mechanical filter to the with energy efficient, submersible pump.  Fish friendly, environmental sound, and energy efficient.  Water looks clean and pristine.

8fce648c2a518dba2.name: Pond Perfect 4 IN 1
8fce648c2a518dba2.description: Crystal clear water.  100% non-toxic and enviro-safe.  Eliminates algae bloom, string algae, scum, mats, and foul odors.  Digests organic sludge.  Safe and beneficial for birds, plants, animals and fish.

a159c3240c3d3f970.name: PondTabbs Plant Food
a159c3240c3d3f970.description: Feed aquatic plants to maximum beauty.  Water soluble tablets combine controlled nitrogen release with rapid nutrient.  No chemicals released that would encourage growth of algae; when direction followed.  Use one tablet per gallon of soil per month.  Safe for fish.

a447fab2b90e6259c.name: Cal PWM 2600 Waterfall Pump
a447fab2b90e6259c.description: Magnetically waterfall pumps are reliable and energy efficient. Ideal for waterfalls, streams, ponds, water gardens, fountains, and other water displays. Uses 40-60% less energy than direct drive pumps.  Mag. drive 3900 GPH waterfall pump.  Max flow 4600 GPH and max height 19-feet.  Includes 20-feet cord.  Can be installed inline; 1 ½ inch FNPT discharge and 1 ½ in MNPT intake.

14da8a19843163b9c.name: Cal Pwm 3900 Waterfall Pump
14da8a19843163b9c.description: Magnetically waterfall pumps are reliable and energy efficient. Ideal for waterfalls, streams, ponds, water gardens, fountains, and other water displays. Uses 40-60% less energy than direct drive pumps.  Mag. drive 2600 GPH waterfall pump.  Max flow 3525 GPH and max height 14.5-feet.  Includes 20-feet cord.  Can be installed inline; 1 ½ inch FNPT discharge and 1 ½ in MNPT intake.

92da5727b1444e63e.name: Replacement Filter Carbon or Polyester Pad
92da5727b1444e63e.description: Meets demanding requirements of pond hobbyists and professionals.  Environmentally sound and energy efficient.  Resist compacting.  Complete replacement set that provides mechanical, biological, and chemical filtration.  Fish friendly.

8a56b7519e4c0df06.name: Safer Caterpillar Killer
8a56b7519e4c0df06.description: Get rid of caterpillars, gypsy moths, cabbage loopers, tomato horn warms, and more.  Use in late afternoon or cloudy days. The bacillus thuringiensis breaks down in sunlight.  Safe to use around children, pets, wildlife, and great for use on water lillies!

8728db393e463ce79.name: Cygnet Shore Klear
8728db393e463ce79.description: Effectivly get rid of those unwanted water plants.  Not effective on plants that grow under water.  Spray onto foliage of the plant and it kills the plant and roots.  Must be used with activator.  Effectiveness may be reduced if rain occurs within 6 hours of treatment.  Results normally begin to show 2 to 4 days but can take as long as 2 weeks.  Nonselective herbicide for control of cattails, brush, and weeks that grow out of water. Waters treated have no restrictions for swimming, irrigation, human or animal consumption.

9a79f6ce2ad34261e.name: Solids Filter Material
9a79f6ce2ad34261e.description: Save money – cut your own filter pad.  Easily cut.  Variety of materials available.  Can be rinsed, cleaned, and reused over and over.  For maximum savings buy full rolls and cut to length needed.

5f6329bc761c82cbb.name: Microbe-Lift Summer Staple Food With Color Enhancer
5f6329bc761c82cbb.description: Nutritious food and color enhancer.   Protein and color enhancers are needed as warm weather approaches.  Contains stabilized Vitamin C for increased vitality.  Will not cloud water.   Promotes brilliant color development.

24291161899943b71.name: Microbe-Lift Summer Staple Food With Fruits And Greens
24291161899943b71.description: Fruits and vegetables have been cut and blended for you.  Variety of vegetables and fruits scientifically blended as well as carbohydrates and protein.  Supplement food.  Feed 4 days per week.  Will not cloud water.
